channel.title: Whonix kvm not starting
channel.description:
Hi I'm using Ubuntu Kvm and whonix, I'm able to install it and have whonix start up. Then I restart my server and everytime I keep having this error. Can anyone please help me.
root@ubuntu:~# virsh start Whonix-Gateway error: Failed to start domain Whonix-Gateway error: internal error: process exited while connecting to monitor: /usr/bin/kvm- spice: 2: exec: qemu-system-x86_64: Permission denied
root@ubuntu:~# virsh list --all Id Name State ---------------------------------------------------- - Whonix-Gateway shut off - Whonix-Workstation shut off - Whonix-Workstation1 shut off
root@ubuntu:~# sudo virsh start Whonix-Gateway error: Failed to start domain Whonix-Gateway error: internal error: process exited while connecting to monitor: /usr/bin/kvm-spice: 2: exec: qemu-system-x86_64: Permission denied
